name: CreateNewService
description:
Create a new service for incident management.

Use this tool to create a new service within an account for incident management, representing an application, component, or team. Ensure the status is set to 'active' during creation. This tool is essential for managing services and handling incidents efficiently.

parameters.name: accept_header
parameters.description: The `Accept` header used for specifying the API version.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type_header
parameters.description: Specify the content type of the request. Must be 'application/json'.

parameters.name: service_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details about the service to be created, such as name, description, type, etc.
